elements.description:
`cosmoz-image-viewer` is an element for displaying images in a carousel while being able to detach the currently
selected image into another window, zooming and activating a fullscreen mode.

A user can enable the zoom mode by
a) clicking on the zoom button
b) double clicking on this element

The zoom mode (+ pan) gets disabled when the image is zoomed out (The initial zoom level is active.) again
so a user can swipe to the next image.

properties.name: currentImage
properties.description: The url of the currenly selected image.

properties.name: currentImageIndex
properties.description: The index in the images array of the currently selected image.

properties.name: detachedWindowName
properties.description: Unique name of browsing context for detached window

properties.name: detachedWindowFeatures
properties.description:
Detached window features
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/open#Window_features

properties.name: _detachedWindowFeaturesString
properties.description: Detached window features in string format

properties.name: _defaultDetachedWindowTitle
properties.description:
Default title of detached window document,
used if no title attribute/property is specified

properties.name: _detachedWindowTitle
properties.description:
Evaluated title of detached window document.
Supplied title or default

properties.name: selectedImageNumber
properties.description: Like currentImageIndex but starts at 1 instead of 0.

properties.name: isDetached
properties.description: If true, the detached window is open.

properties.name: images
properties.description: The images array.

properties.name: scrollPercent
properties.description: The percent the view should scroll down after the image got loaded.

properties.name: imageLoaded
properties.description: If true, the currently selected image is fully loaded.

properties.name: selectedItem
properties.description: The selected slide in the carousel

properties.name: isZoomed
properties.description: If true, the current image is zoomed.

properties.name: showNav
properties.description: If true, navigation next/prev buttons are visible.

properties.name: showDots
properties.description: If true, pagination dots are visible.

properties.name: showZoom
properties.description: If true, a zoom button is visible.

properties.name: showFullscreen
properties.description: If true, a fullscreen button is visible.

properties.name: showDetach
properties.description: If true, a detach button is visible.

properties.name: showClose
properties.description: If true, a close icon is visible. Useful if displayed as an overlay.

properties.name: showPageNumber
properties.description: If true, the current page number (e.g. 2/5) is visible.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title used as tooltip and detached window document title

properties.name: loop
properties.description:
If true, clicking on next when the last image is selected,
will show the first image again.

properties.name: credentials
properties.description:
If true, will add credentials to fetch call,
defaults to true

properties.name: downloadFileName
properties.description:
The filename of the zip archive when downloaded
in the detached window.

properties.name: _resolvedImages
properties.description: The url resolved images array.

methods.name: _argumentsToObject
methods.description: Convert arguments to an object, skipping some argument.

methods.name: _arrayToObject
methods.description: Convert an array to an object.
Convenience method for gettext. Translates a text.

methods.name: gettext
methods.description:
Translates a text. Example of basic translation: `_(string, t)`
{{ _(‘My translation’, t) }}
Example of basic translation with interpolation: `_(string, [args], t)`
{{ _(‘Hello {0}’, user.name, t) }}

methods.name: ngettext
methods.description:
Plural version of gettext. Translates a text to the current locale using the first numeric argument after the two first arguments to determine if output should be singular or plural. Example of translation in singular or plural: `ngettext(singular, plural, count, t)`
{{ ngettext(‘My translation’, ‘My translations’, count, t) }}
Example of translation in singular or plural with interpolation: `ngettext(singular, plural, [count and other args], t)`
{{ ngettext(‘My translation for “{1}”’, ‘My {0} translations for “{1}”’, count, ‘hello’, t) }}

methods.name: pgettext
methods.description:
Translates a text using a specific context. Example of translation with context: `pgettext(context, ‘text’, t)`
{{ pgettext(‘Cancel Invoice’, ‘Cancel’, t) }}
Example of translation including context with interpolation: `pgettext(context, ‘text’, [args], t)`
{{ pgettext(‘Cancel Invoice’, ‘Cancel {0}’, document.type, t) }}

methods.name: npgettext
methods.description:
Translates a text in singular or plural with a specific context. Example of translation in singular or plural with context: `npgettext(context, singular, plural, count, t)`
{{ npgettext('Cancel invoice', ‘My cancellation’, ‘My {0} cancellations’, count, t) }}
Example of translation in singular or plural with context and interpolation: `npgettext(context, singular, plural, count, t)`
{{ npgettext('Cancel invoice', ‘My {1} cancellation’, ‘My {0} {1} cancellations’, count, document.type, t) }}

methods.name: nextImage
methods.description: Triggers the slide to the next image.

methods.name: previousImage
methods.description: Triggers the slide to the previous image.

methods.name: zoomToggle
methods.description: Toggles between initial zoom level and 1.5x initial zoom level.

elements.name: CosmozImageViewer
